item.title: Application Performance Monitoring Home page
item.description: Click APM in the main menu, the APM Home Page is made up of 3 distinct sections: Onboarding Pane Pane: Training videos and links to documentation to get you started with Splunk APM. APM Overview Pane: Real-time metrics for the Top Services and Top Business Workflows. Functions Pane: Links for deeper analysis of your services, tags, traces, database query performance and code profiling. The APM Overview pan provides a high-level view of the health of your application.
